Blue Ecstasy (1980)

Starring: Lesllie Bovee, Samantha Fox, Candida Royalle, Christine DeShaffer
Categories: Classic

(858 Mb)

BLUE ECSTASY is an unusual film that explores with candor the sexual conflict acted out by dual personalities inhabiting the single body of a young woman. Veronica has an unusual companion â€“ Ronnie who is the exact opposite of Veronica. Her friend Niki is a fun loving person and cannot at all understand Veronica`s prudishness. At Niki`s suggestion, she and Veronica go shopping for some new, sexy clothes for Veronica`s changing personality â€“ which becomes the catalyst for a film revealing many layers of sexual denial and redemption.
